rComments: This professor ran a sham Buddhist school out of his U of T office, failed to register it properly, was refused permission to offer diplomas, and then closed the school. The school failed people because they disagreed with the professor or followed other traditions.
He is terrible.  I don't trust him at all.  He is unclear and boring!  His marking is ridiculous.  Avoid him at all costs!

His teaching is not clear. His way religious and not academic. He doesn't seem to have had training in Buddhist Studies but in education. I'm saying this, because he relates his topics on Buddhism to education everytime possible.
a real jerk!!! he doesn''t know how to teach. He wastes our time and money.
Helpful and compassionate, although somewhat given to an overtly religious as opposed to an academic approach to the material covered.
